result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

2:11 PM Defendant Christopher Davale Mungon in court.  Attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Jacob Birenbaum in court for Christopher Davale Mungon. 
Court grants State's request for extradition. State will efile a proposed order.

11:51 AM Prosecuting attorney Joel N Urmanski in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Christopher Davale Mungon appeared by phone, in custody.  Attorney Jacob Birenbaum appeared by phone for Christopher Davale Mungon. 
DA Urmanski does not have the documents from Governor's office yet, has been in regular contact and was advised that mailing was done June 8th. Was in contact with Dept of Justice also and requested documents to be overnighted if possible due to the 90th day being this Thursday. Requests time on the calendar this Thursday, if documents not received yet, then case would be dismissed.
Court reschedules for Thursday.
Extradition hearing scheduled for June 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Extradition hearing on June 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Jacob Birenbaum appeared by phone for Christopher Davale Mungon. State advised warrant is being sought from demanding state, at this time Sheboygan does not have warrant in hand, State requests date closest to the 90 day extension expiration date.
Extradition hearing scheduled for June 14, 2022 at 11:45 am.

Petition for appointment of counsel, affidavit of indigency and order.  Atty. Birenbaum is appointed as counsel.
